page.title: 11Wetwang,Archeological Site
page.content:
Just outside Wetwang near Wetwang Grange off the road to Driffield is a large and very important archeological site.Bronze Age chariots,weapons and skeletons have been found.It was a burial site.
Each year a bit more is excavated.It is on Mr.Hardy's land and there have been two main findings.The chariots were found first and some skeletons and then the weaponry.They are hundreds of years old.
They were found accidently by a man parking his truck and he realised what he saw and reported it.
